text: ABM Fazle Karim Chowdhury (November 6, 1954) is a Bangladesh Awami League politician and the incumbent Member of Parliament of Raozan upazila in Chittagong District. ==Career== Chowdhury was elected to parliament from Chittagong-6. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Chittagong District Category:Awami League politicians Category:9th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:10th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:11th Jatiya Sangsad members
title: A.B.M. Fazle Karim Chowdhury
